channel.title: Ggmail Released!
channel.description:
ggmail Released! http://www.blog.solarwind.metafy.org/2008/02/27/ggmail-100-alpha-released/
Click the link above for all the information relating to this project. What I need right now is a lot of testers. This is the very first release with about two days worth of testing and coding. It may look simple, but trust me, it's not.
Linux only at this time. Test it out and tell me how it works! Don't be afraid to say it sucks, but please post constructive feedback, thanks!

item.title: Ggmail Released!
item.dc:creator: @solarwind solarwind
item.description:
@solarwind wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:12, topic:184870”][quote author=teh spede link=topic=246571.msg2087999#msg2087999 date=1204665834]
I found somekind of gmail notifier from add/remove applications in ubuntu and it was very handy. I guess I’ll try this one too.
[/quote]
You are probably thinking of http://gmail-notify.sourceforge.net/[/quote]
Yeah, I hate that one, It’s ugly. That’s why I made this one…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 09:10:15 PM[/size][hr]Released another version: http://www.blog.solarwind.metafy.org/2008/03/08/ggmail-120-beta-released/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 09:11:39 PM[/size][hr]Released another version: http://www.blog.solarwind.metafy.org/2008/03/08/ggmail-120-beta-released/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 09:12:15 PM[/size][hr]Released another version: http://www.blog.solarwind.metafy.org/2008/03/08/ggmail-120-beta-released/

Read full topic

item.title: Ggmail Released!
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

I didn’t notice until now. This is your project? Congrats. It’s a great idea. If only Google had’ve made a standalone Gmail notifier. This is perfect. When you click the icon, does it open an email client? Like ThunderBird?

Google provides one for mac and windows users.
http://toolbar.google.com/gmail-helper/notifier_windows.html

Solarwind is filling the need for linux users.

Read full topic

item.title: Ggmail Released!
item.dc:creator: @solarwind solarwind
item.description:
@solarwind wrote:

Yeah, this is my project, made it from scratch. If you click on the icon, force checks for mail, middle click quits it and right click opens firefox to your gmail inbox.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 02, 2008, 11:19:19 PM[/size][hr]The guys at the Ubuntu forums are loving it xD http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=709966

Read full topic

item.title: Ggmail Released!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I didn’t notice until now. This is your project? Congrats. It’s a great idea. If only Google had’ve made a standalone Gmail notifier. This is perfect. When you click the icon, does it open an email client? Like ThunderBird?

Read full topic

item.title: Ggmail Released!
item.dc:creator: @solarwind solarwind
item.description:
@solarwind wrote:

Yeah, been running it for over 48 hours continuously. Works like a charm. I even had a few network disconnections (crappy ISP) and I made it so the thing detects that and tells you there’s a connection error. As soon as your internet is working again, it will function normally automatically. Very reliable. Tell me if you want me to add any features.

Read full topic

item.title: Ggmail Released!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I may take a whack at it then.

Read full topic

item.title: Ggmail Released!
item.dc:creator: @solarwind solarwind
item.description:
@solarwind wrote:

Second version released, it’s VERY stable now. http://www.blog.solarwind.metafy.org/2008/03/02/ggmail-110-alpha-released/ I’ve been running it for days without a problem. Tweaked for speed, reliability and good looks.

Read full topic

item.title: Ggmail Released!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Well, since it’s in Alpha. I’m going to wait till a few more updates take place. But for the moment I’ll keep an eye on it.

Read full topic

Did you test it?
